subject: Communication
title: AI-Generated Content: The Trust Crisis
description: A short lesson to help you apply AI-Generated Content: The Trust Crisis.

hook.text: An AI wrote an article, a student submitted it, and the professor gave it an A. Nobody could tell.

buildup.text: Generative AI can now produce articles, images, videos, and social media posts indistinguishable from human-created.

discovery.text: This creates an unprecedented trust crisis: if anything can be generated, how do you verify what's real?

twist.text: The flood of AI content makes human-verified, trustworthy sources more valuable â€” not less.

climax.text: The future of media literacy isn't just detecting fakes. It's building trust systems: verified sources, provenance.

punchline.text: In a world of infinite content, the scarcest resource is trust.

quiz.question: What becomes the scarcest resource when AI can generate unlimited content?
